    |________|__|_____|__|__|_____|_____|__|__|_____|
                                       version 2.2.0

    Build composable event pipeline servers with minimal effort.



    ======================
    wishbone.input.twitter
    ======================

    Version: 1.0.0

    Reads Tweets from Twitter.
    --------------------------


        Reads tweets from Twitter.


        Parameters:

            - consumer_key(str)()
               |  The Twitter consumer_key value to authenticate.

            - consumer_secret(str)()
                | The Twitter consumer_secret value to authenticate.

            - access_token(str)()
                | The Twitter access_token value to authenticate.

            - access_token_secret(str)()
                | The Twitter access_token_secret value to authenticate.

            - timeline(bool)(False)
                | If True includes all events of the authenticated user's timeline

            - users(list)[]
                | A list of users to follow

            - track(list)["#wishbone"]
                | A list of expressions to follow

        Queues:

            - outbox
               |  Incoming Tweets
info.name: wishbone_input_twitter
info.summary: A Wishbone module to read data from Twitter.

                                   version 2.2.0

Build composable event pipeline servers with minimal effort.



======================
wishbone.input.twitter
======================

Version: 1.0.0

Reads Tweets from Twitter.
--------------------------


    Reads tweets from Twitter.


    Parameters:

        - consumer_key(str)()
           |  The Twitter consumer_key value to authenticate.

        - consumer_secret(str)()
            | The Twitter consumer_secret value to authenticate.

        - access_token(str)()
            | The Twitter access_token value to authenticate.

        - access_token_secret(str)()
            | The Twitter access_token_secret value to authenticate.

        - timeline(bool)(False)
            | If True includes all events of the authenticated user's timeline

        - users(list)[]
            | A list of users to follow

        - track(list)["#wishbone"]
            | A list of expressions to follow

    Queues:

        - outbox
           |  Incoming Tweets
